text:
Native Axis (https://nativeaxis.com) | QA Engineer | San Diego, CA | REMOTE

We provide automated and on-demand marketing services for Real Estate agents. We're a small team, fully remote, but we prefer local candidates to make it easier to meet once every couple weeks. We're looking for a QA Engineer with enough technical skill to debug HTML, CSS, JS issues and build up test automation.

Stack: Node, React, MySQL, Elasticsearch Jobs page: https://native-axis.workable.com/jobs/388563
